column5: Hey all great site  Was lurking for a while and joined a bit ago.  My son (9yo) and I do as much fishing as we can.  We are pretty pumped now cause I bought a new boat this week (08 Smokercraft Alaskan Deluxe 15ft. 20hp Merc 4stroker.)  Heading for Laniel Que. as soon as I can get away. (great area)    Cheers
Welcome aboard Silo Buster  Nice ride you just bought....I'm sure you'll enjoy it Question: Where is Laniel Que....which region are you targetting??  Leechman
Thanks Leechman  Laniel,Que. is at the top end of Lac Kipawa.  Looking at a map its NE of North Bay
OK Silo.....Thanks for the info and good luck on your venture Leechman
Welcome aboard Silo Buster....  I gotta ask about your user name?????  Cheers  Craig
Thanks Craig  Just kinda threw the name together.I have a silo on the farm here,and my mutts name is Buster...
